title: BRIEF-Century Aluminum Says Co, Certain Units Entered Amended & Restated $175 Mln Senior Secured Revolving Credit Facility
text:

* CENTURY ALUMINUM - NEW CREDIT FACILITY REPLACES COâ€™S EXISTING $150 MILLION SENIOR SECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY SCHEDULED TO EXPIRE IN 2020
